expiry: Page title for special page of expiry manager
specialexpiry: Name of the special page for expiry
prefs-expiry: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:Preferences}} Special:Preferences], headline for expiry section in preferences.
apihelp-bs-expiry-store-description:
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-expiry-store}}
Describes the API endpoint that provides expiry data
apihelp-bs-expiry-tasks-description:
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-expiry-tasks}}
Describes the API endpoint that handles expiry tasks
bs-expiry-unexpire-article: Label in statebar to mark a page as expired
bs-expiry-do-unexpire-article: Label for button that removes the expiration form a page
bs_expiry-unexpire-success: Message to display when the page was unexpired successfully
bs_expiry-unexpire-unsuccess: Message to display when the page could not be unexpired
bs-expiry-specialpage-subtitle: Backlink to $1\n $1 is the title of the to link back to
bs-expiry-header-pagename: Label of the column for page
bs-expiry-header-date: Label of the column for expiry date
bs-expiry-header-comment: Label of the column for comment
bs-expiry-dialog-title: Title for dialog to edit expiry
bs-expiry-date-label: Label of the dialog field for expiry date
bs-expiry-article-label: Label of the dialog field for page to expire
bs-expiry-comment-label: Label of the dialog field for comment
bs-expiry-delete-error-unknown: Message to display when the expiry could not be deleted.
bs-expiry-unknown-page-msg: Message to display when the page does not exist.
bs-expiry-create-error: Message to display when the expiry could not be created.
bs-expiry-update-error: Message to display when the expiry could not be updated.
bs-expiry-update-success: Message to display when the expiry was updated successfully
bs-expiry-save-success: Message to display when the expiry was created successfully
bs-expiry-unexpire-unsuccess: Message to display when the expiry ID not found
bs-expiry-unexpire-success: Message to display when the expiry was deleted successfully
bs-expiry-menu-entry-create: More menu item for creating expiry
bs-expiry-text-delete:
Confirmation question to be displayed when user wants to delete one or more expiries.

$1 number of expiries
bs-expiry-title-delete: Title for dialog to remove expiry
bs-expiry-nav-link-title-expiry: Text of the button in the right navigation that opens the flyout
bs-expiry-flyout-form-title: Title of the new expiry form
bs-expiry-flyout-next-expired: Message when the page is currently expired
bs-expiry-flyout-next-current: Message when the page is not yet expired, but has expiration set. $1 - number of days before page expires, $2 - date of expiration
bs-expiry-flyout-expiry-not-set: Message when the page has no expiration set
bs-expiry-flyout-next-comment: Text to show comment of the expiration. $1 - comment text
bs-expiry-flyout-manager-button-label: Label for the button leading to Expiry special page
bs-expiry-edit-grid-header-username: Header text for username column in flyout grid showing changes since page expired
bs-expiry-edit-grid-header-date: Header text for date column in flyout grid showing changes since page expired
bs-expiry-edit-grid-header-comment: Header text for comment column in flyout grid showing changes since page expired
bs-expiry-edit-grid-title: Title for the flyout grid showing changes since page expired
bs-expiry-edit-grid-empty: Text displayed if there are no edits since the page expired
bs-expiry-flyout-body-hint-expired:
Text displayed in flyout when the article expired.
*$1 - Expiry date
bs-expiry-flyout-body-hint-expires:
Text displayed in flyout when the article expires.
*$1 - Expiry date
bs-expiry-alert-body-expired:
Text displayed in alert provider when the article expired.
*$1 - Expiry date
bs-expiry-pref-enablepdfwatermark: Label for configuration of whether to show watermark for expired pages in PDF
bs-expiry-pref-enableprintwatermark: Label for configuration of whether to show watermark for expired pages in print version of the page
bs-expiry-pref-enablepagewatermark: Label for configuration of whether to show watermark for expired pages in normal wiki view mode
bs-expiry-pageinfoelement-expired-label: Label for expiry information in page header for expired page
bs-expiry-pageinfoelement-expired-toolti: Tooltip for expiry information in page header for expired page
bs-expiry-pageinfoelement-unexpire-label: Label for expiry information in page header to unexpire page
bs-expiry-pageinfoelement-unexpire-toolt: Tooltip for expiry information in page header to unexpire page
echo-category-title-bs-expiry-daily-cat: Message to display on user preferences for notifications category bs-expiry-daily-cat
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-expiry-daily-cat: Tooltip for Echo notification category bs-expiry-daily-cat
echo-category-title-bs-expiry-weekly-cat: Message to display on user preferences for notifications category bs-expiry-weekly-cat
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-expiry-weekly-cat: Tooltip for Echo notification category bs-expiry-weekly-cat
notification-bs-expiry-today-subject:
Subject of the notification that a page expired today.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expired
notification-bs-expiry-today-web-body:
Body of the notification that a page expired today.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expired
* $2 - comment that was left when the expiration date was set for the page
notification-bs-expiry-today-email-body:
Body of the notification that a page expired today.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expired
* $2 - comment that was left when the expiration date was set for the page
notification-bs-expiry-one-week-subject:
Subject of the notification that a page expires in this week.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expired
notification-bs-expiry-one-week-web-body:
Body of the notification that a page expires in this week.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expires
* $2 - comment that was left when the expiration date was set for the page
notification-bs-expiry-one-week-email-bo:
Body of the notification that a page expires in this week.
* $1 - the title of the page, that expires
* $2 - comment that was left when the expiration date was set for the page
bs-expiry-create-reminder-label: Label for checkbox to create reminder
bs-expiry-do-updateexpirydate-article: Label for button that opens a dialog that allows the user to update the expiration date of a page
